Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Nh Castellón Turcosa in Castellon de la Plana (El Grao de Castellon), you'll be minutes from Plaza del Mar and Gran Casino Castellon. This hotel is within close proximity of Castellon Planetarium and Club de Golf Costa de Azahar.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 70 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have bathtubs or showers and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Nh Castellón Turcosa, or find a snack in a coffee shop/café. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. Planning an event in Castellon de la Plana? This hotel features 3346 square feet (311 square meters) of event facilities.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Nh Castellón Turcosa, or find a snack in a coffee shop/café. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

With a stay at Nh Castellón Turcosa in Castellon de la Plana (El Grao de Castellon), you'll be minutes from Plaza del Mar and Gran Casino Castellon. This hotel is within close proximity of Castellon Planetarium and Club de Golf Costa de Azahar.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Plaza del Mar - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Gran Casino Castellon - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Castellon Planetarium - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Club de Golf Costa de Azahar - 2.5 km / 1.5 mi
Castellon del Mar Cathedral - 4.6 km / 2.9 mi
El Fadri - 4.6 km / 2.9 mi
Provincial Hospital of Castellon - 5.2 km / 3.3 mi
Plaza de Toros de Castellon - 5.3 km / 3.3 mi
Heliopolis Beach - 5.4 km / 3.4 mi
Jaume I University - 7.5 km / 4.7 mi
Benicassim Beach - 10.3 km / 6.4 mi
Teatre Municipal de Benicassim - 10.3 km / 6.4 mi
Church of Santo Tomas - 10.3 km / 6.4 mi
Almadraba Beach - 10.5 km / 6.5 mi
El Madrigal Stadium - 10.5 km / 6.5 mi

The nearest airports are:
Castellon de la Plana (CDT) - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Valencia (VLC) - 67.7 km / 42.1 mi

The preferred airport for Nh Castellón Turcosa is Valencia (VLC).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Valencia Manises (VLC): Approximate driving time is 60 minutes and distance is 65 kilometres (40 miles).

Frequent buses leave from the departures terminal connecting the airport with Valencia city centre. Taxis can be found in front of arrivals and charge approximately €15 to the city centre. The nearest railway station to the hotel is seven kilometres away. Valencia has an efficient public transport system that includes underground metro and bus services.

Driving directions: From Manises airport: Take the A-7 motorway to Castellon-Sud. Once there, head to the port.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
